Announcement.BankaraIdolC: Ay? (This theme seems oddly familiar, have we seen it before?)

Announcement.IdolA: Yeah! Dont you remember? The same theme happened in Splatsville a while back.

Announcement.IdolB: What would YOU bring to a deserted island?

Announcement.BankaraIdolB: That's easy! Grub is food, and you need food to live. Plus, Team Grub is the only team that tastes good!

Announcement.IdolA: I'm gonna have to stop you there, Frye. Team Gear is the way to go! Without gear, where are you going to sleep? Under a rock?

Announcement.BankaraIdolA: Yeah, under the same rock that CRUSHED Team Paper in the last Splatfest!

Announcement.IdolB: Okay, Shiver. Let's see what you do once you've gone a few days without eating anything.

Announcement.BankaraIdolA: You're missing the point here. With gear, you can catch fish, cook it over a fire, and you'll never be hungry.

Announcement.BankaraIdolC: Ay. Ay! (None of us will end up getting off of that island anyway. At least, on Team Fun, we'll get to spend our last days having FUN!)

Announcement.BankaraIdolB: What are you gonna do? Play Mario against a coconut?

Announcement.BankaraIdolC: Ay! (You know, there are plenty of games to play by yourself!)

Announcement.IdolA: Alright, Big Man. You have FUN with that.
Everyone watching, don't forget to choose a team!

Announcement.IdolB: Just look for the Splatfest terminal in the Plaza. You can't miss it!

MidFest.BankaraIdolA: The Splatfest is on now! And the theme... What would you bring to a deserted island?

MidFest.BankaraIdolC: Ay! (Vote at the Splatfest terminal in the Plaza. Then head to the lobby and jump into battle!)
